name: Mini Rubik's Cube
description:
Here is an academic project I made in 2021.
It is a 3D 2x2 Rubik's Cube and you can move the cube and rotate the differents faces.
It was made in Python using Pygame and PyOpenGL.

How to use :
Rotate the cube : Arrow Keys or LMB
Rotate faces : 1 to 6 and F1 to F6
Zoom in/out : MMB scroll down/up
